frame.name: Containing
frame.definition: <def-root>In this frame a <fen>Container</fen> holds within its physical boundaries the <fen>Contents</fen>. <ex><fex name="Container">The box</fex> <t>holds</t> <fex name="Contents">three hundred pictures</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Container
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Container</fen> is the physical object which holds within its boundaries the <fen>Contents</fen>
<ex><fex name="Container">The box</fex> <t>holds</t> three hundred pictures.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Contents
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Contents</fen> is the substance or objects contained within the physical bounds of the <fen>Container</fen>. <ex>The box <t>holds</t> <fex name="Contents">three hundred pictures</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the <fen>Container</fen> holds the <fen>Contents</fen>.</def-root>
